text: In 100 days of code, you guys have made a lot of noise. Everyone's tempo is very high. So today I am going to tell you how we can take user input. If you interact with a program and then it responds, then you will have a lot of fun. Do you know why games are so addictive? Because whatever input they are giving to the computer, the computer actually responds to their inputs. And then they really like this thing that we are giving input and the computer is responding. You can give this kind of input to your Python programs. I will tell you how this thing is done. How Python program is given input from your keyboard. Let's go to the computer screen and let's get started. The user input in Python programming is taken with the help of input function.
